channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Advance Your SOC Skills with the Power of Microsoft Sentinel data lake and graph
item.description: Microsoft Sentinel has evolved beyond a traditional SIEM into a unified, AI-ready security platform that brings data, analytics, intelligence, and automation together. At the core are Microsoft Sentinel data lake and Microsoft Sentinel graph: data lake enables long-term retention and high-scale analytics, and graph adds entity relationships to speed investigations. We have updated skilling to reflect these changes, so defenders can build the right hands-on skills faster.1. Learn How to Run High‑Scale Searches with data lake: Search Jobs in Microsoft Sentinel Unit: Use Search Jobs in Microsoft ...
